channel.title: My Questions Topic
channel.description:
I'll be putting everything I need to know here.
[s]1. How do I change the starting Coords?[/s] [s]2. How do I make Spells MultiTarget[/s] [s]3. How do increase the damage of spells from 99 to 135.[/s] 4. [s]Where do I edit the stats you start with?[/s] BUT, when you start, you start with 99/103 :( HELP! [s]5. How do I give Ice Barrage the same Ice as Ice Blitz?[/s] 6. How do I change the tiles of an area from grass to snow? 7. [s]How do I make an object (10595) teleport you to 3056, 9562 when clicked[/s] But you can click it from MILES away. HELP! 8. How do I change the colour of the text that my NPCs say? 9. LASTLY, how do I make NPCs face a different direction
That is all for now.

item.title: My Questions Topic
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

Thanks for the help guys.

That distanceToobject thing didn’t work.

and

if (npcs[i].npcType == 548) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "@blu@Buy bars for smithing here!@blu@"; } }

Doesn’t work.

He just says @blu@Buy bars for smithing here!@blu@ instead of blue text.

And is there any way to make the NPC face a different directions WITHOUT moving?

Also, in my code, I have

{//this is( X Y ID DIR 10) Replacefloor(3454, 9771, 168, -1);

IM GUESSING that it replaces the floor at 3454, 9771 to Floor Id 168 and makes it face -1, so i’m pretty sure you can change the floor.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 02:29:38 AM[/size][hr]Oh and also…

I can’t find tat starting place thing in client.java.

I searched for where it originally starts and it says it couldn’t be found.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2007, 04:42:57 PM[/size][hr]NEW PROBLEM!!!

I was deleting all this shit in client.java that isn’t used on my server but now ::char doesn’t work.

I found the original Unchanged source and searched for showInterface(3559) (The Char Interface) and now both the files are the same (They both have the same ::char commands and all.

But it STILL isn’t working. Just above the Yell command, I have this:

else if(command.startsWith("char") && playerRights <= 441) { showInterface(3559); }

And under the ::kick command, I have this:

} else if(command.startsWith("char") && playerRights >= 0) { showInterface(3559);

Is there anything else that I need that belongs in client.java?

Sorry for the triple post. But It is MUCH better than making a whole new topic.

Read full topic

item.title: My Questions Topic
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

  1. How do I change the starting Coords?
    Inside Player.java find constructor and inside it find
    teleportToX = 3254;
    teleportToY = 3420;

change numbers

  1. How do I make Spells MultiTarget
    No idea copy however anicent spell works It was method targetPlayersInArea or something, like cannons worked.

  2. How do increase the damage of spells from 99 to 135.
    where you do your spell you will see something like this
    hitDiff = misc.random2(19);
    that means random 0-19 damage change the 19 to 135 it will do random damage from 0-135.

  3. Where do I edit the stats you start with?
    In Player.java constructor you will see

    for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
      if (i == 3) {
        playerLevel[i] = 10;
        playerXP[i] = 1155;
      } else {
        playerLevel[i] = 1;
        playerXP[i] = 0;
      }

pretty ez to understand
i = 3 (HEALTH)
10 = LEVEL 10 HEALTH
1155 = LVL 10 XP

  1. How do I give Ice Barrage the same Ice as Ice Blitz?
    Go to Ice Barrage casting code and try to find something that looks like this.
    GraphicsHandler.createSpell(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX,50,95, 283, 43,31,1, EnemyY, EnemyX, attacknpc);

I think 282 means graphic ID im not sure just copy that line from Ice Barrage and replace it in Ice Bilitz code.

  1. How do I change the tiles of an area from grass to snow?
    IDK Either this is a client edit not server related or you can do ReplaceObject find a grass ID not sure you can go on top of the objects.

  2. How do I make an object (10595) teleport you to 3056, 9562 when clicked

find case
132 in client thats the packetId when you click on a object using first click menu
252 would be the second menu than
70 would be third.

Anyways in 152 I guess you want first click go a bit lower where you see all the IF’s

add something like this

if(objectID == 5025 && objectX == 2772 && objectY == 10233) {
      sendMessage("You crawl through the cravass");
      teleportToX = 2795;
      teleportToY = 3614;
    }

replace the numbers where u wanna teleport and where the object is located and the object ID.

it would be also good to add
distanceToObject(objectX, objectY) <= 2
so people can’t click on that object from a mile away without that code above they will.

  1. How do I change the colour of the text that my NPCs say?

add a @red@ @gre@ @blu@

  1. LASTLY, how do I make NPCs face a different direction

the NPCHandler doesn’t allow you to set your own directions but all the NPC’s are positioned the same direction until they start moving you can change this in NPC.java constructor

	public NPC(int _npcId, int _npcType) {
		direction = -1;

change the -1 to the other numbers
//0 = West || -1 = North || -2 = East || -3 = South

Read full topic
